    • 方法详细资料

      • generateARFF

        public void generateARFF(java.lang.String allWord,
                java.lang.String allData,
                java.lang.String allScoreMax)
        Main file to generate ARFF
        参数:
        allWord - All the keywords
        allData - All the scores and click rate
        allScoreMax - All the maximum scores for normalization

      • createInstance

        private ARFFInstance createInstance(java.lang.String dataLine)
        Create the instances in the ARFF file
        参数:
        dataLine - Each line containing all the score for the tuple (keyword, song)
        返回:
        The instance containing all the information to generate ARFF file

      • ttest

        private double ttest(int x)
        Get the 95% quantile for the t-test under different degree of freedom; the quantile is based on 2x
        参数:
        x - Degree of freedom (cannot exceed 20)
        返回:
        The 95% quantile

      • mean

        private double mean(java.util.List<ARFFInstance> x)
        Get the mean of click rate
        参数:
        x - An array of ARFFInstance
        返回:
        Mean of click rate

      • std

        private double std(java.util.List<ARFFInstance> x)
        Get the standard deviation of click rate
        参数:
        x - An array of ARFFInstance
        返回:
        Standard deviation of click rate
